resources.string: I am a developer, keen on keeping your passwords secure and easily accessible. This app is designed with user privacy in mind, so you can trust us to keep your information safe.

I am the founder and lead developer of this app and have over 2 years of experience in software development. I\'m passionate about creating user-friendly applications that help people manage their digital lives.
Symbiosis Institute of Computer Studies and Research
SICSR is the guidance that made this application possible. It is my under-graduation college from where I\'m pursuing my BCA!
